bibdata.title: Unapproved IEEE Draft Standard for Medical Device Communications
Medical Device Data Language (MDDL) Virtual Medical Device, Specialized Capnometer
Unapproved IEEE Draft Standard for Medical Device Communications - Medical Device Data Language (MDDL) Virtual Medical Device, Specialized Capnometer

organization.name: Institute of Electrical and Electronics Engineers

bibdata.abstract: This standard establishes a model for the implementation of the Capnometer Virtual Medical Device. It establishes a Design Model and specifies how this Model should be implemented. It also provides guidance concerning bandwidth requirements as well as how to specify conformance with this standard.

organization.name: Institute of Electrical and Electronics Engineers
